commenter_b: Would love to see more of Bindi, Robert and Terri would love a show from the zoo. Steve will always be one of the greatest wildlife conservationist to have ever graced us with knowledge and just a fun loving man truly missed
post_message: REMEMBERING STEVE IRWIN: His daughter, Bindi, who continues to walk in her father's footsteps, posted a touching tribute to The Crocodile Hunter on what would have been his 55th birthday. Rest in peace, Steve Irwin. "Always in our hearts."  STORY: @webpagelink
